sentence.Network_en: No one really backs off when Becks gets the ball.
sentence.Network_cn: 而贝克汉姆那球的时候没人会真正后退.

sentence.Network_en: Becks knows boss Alex Ferguson would have the final say.
sentence.Network_cn: 而他也明白这一点只有弗格森爵爷最后点头才有可能发生.

sentence.Network_en: Becks hasn't changed since I've known him. He's always been a Cockney git.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从我认识他以来,小贝从来没有改变过. 他一直就是个光芒四射的伦敦饭桶.
